name: Arcade Defender - Demo
description:
Destroy Arcade invaders and gather coins to upgrade your weapons. Have a complete retro feel with this pixelated shoot'em up. Just the toughest will be able to handle the 100 waves and beat the bosses.

Way harder than it seems, but yet challenging and fun.

Please rate the game :)

Full version available on android: http://bit.ly/2YdfTdm
